title: Becton , Dickinson , and Company 's employees from 2011 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, containing a total of 8 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, gradually increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Number of employees, of value 76032.0 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Number of employees, of value 29400.0 was reported at Year 2011
